blogItems.title: QNote - Blazing Fast Note Taking App
blogItems.subtitle: Creating one of the first Windows Phone Store Apps

blogItems.title: IPManager - Switch Between DHCP and Static IP Easily
blogItems.subtitle: There is an app for your Windows Laptop that allows you to change between DHCP and static IP easily

blogItems.title: PhotoSec - Hide Your Pictures
blogItems.subtitle: One of the first apps to be in the Windows Phone Store that allows you to hide pictures from your phone's gallery

blogItems.title: Today's Meal in Marmara - Food as Notification
blogItems.subtitle: As a student in Bilkent, I sometimes wondered what was available in the school's cafeteria. There should be an app for this

blogItems.title: Rocky Journey - FPGAs and Verilog
blogItems.subtitle: This was our term project for CS223 Digital Design in Bilkent University. We've recreated something like Flappy Bird using an 8x8 LED Matrix

blogItems.title: Personal Website - This Time with React
blogItems.subtitle: I wanted to learn React and also I wanted to make my personal website somewhat better. This was a great opportunity. This is the story how this website is made.
